newsitem.title: UK: Telspec says improvement continues into Q1.
newsitem.headline: Telspec says improvement continues into Q1.

text.p: Telspec Plc, the UK telecommunications equipment supplier, on Thursday said the improved business performance reported for the fourth quarter of 1996 had continued into the first quarter of this year.

"This improvement results from the impact of product cost reduction programs, improved internal management controls and sales growth in certain international markets," chief executive Jonathan Paget told the annual general meeting.
Telspec shares firmed on the statement and were up 12-1/2 pence at 282-1/2 at 1022 GMT.
